name: Riri & Coco
description:
Riri & Coco are prisoners of the drawing book !📖

To get out of the book you have to solve the puzzle by collaborating as fast as possible. 🧩

Riri and Coco are very different: 

- Riri can roll and be propelled 🧨

-  Coco is smaller and can be pushed by Riri 🥌

Will you be able to get out of the book ? 

Controls 🖱️  

Riri : Move with AD and Crouch with S

Coco : Move with ⬅️➡️and Crouch with ⬇️

Credits 👨‍👩‍👦
